من عند عند علي
بن حجازي
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
أعلم حضرة الشّيخ أبو مفرّج وفّقه اللّه تعل
أنّي أرسلت لك عشر قطع دقيق وعشر
أرادب قمح فبمن اللّه لا تسلّم لأحد منهم شي
حتّى أصل إليك واللّه اللّه الوصيّة
عليهم فتحطّهم عند موضع جيّد
ولا تسلّم لأحد منهم شي غيري
والسّلام عليك ورحمة اللّه وإحسانه

min ʿabdi ʿindi ʿaliyyi
bni ḥiǧāziyy:in
bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
ʾuʿlimu ḥaḍraẗa ăš šayḫi ʾabū mufarriǧ:in waffaqa hu ăl lāhu taʿāla
ʾan nī ʾarsaltu la ka ʿašra qiṭaʿ:in daqīq wa ʿašra
ʾarādiba qamḥ fa bi manni ăl lāhi lā tusallim li ʾaḥad:in min hum šayʾ
ḥattà ʾaṣilu ʾilay ka wa ăl lāhu ăl lāhu ăl waṣiyyaẗu
ʿalay him fa taḥuṭṭi him ʿinda mawḍiʿ:in ǧayyid:in
wa lā tusallim li ʾaḥad:in min hum šayʾ ġayr ī
wa ăs salāmu ʿalay ka wa raḥmaẗu ăl lāhi wa ʾiḥsānu hu

From the servant of ʿAlī
ibn Ḥijāzī.
In the name of God, the Merciful, the Compassionate.
I am writing to inform your Highness, Shaykh Abū Mufarrij - may God, Almighty, make him (i.e., you) successful! - that This is to inform Shaykh Abu Mufarrij
I have sent to you ten qiṭʿa-units of flour and ten that I have sent to you ten measures of flour and ten
ardabbs of grain by the Grace of Almighty God. Do not deliver to anyone of them anything irdabbs of wheat. By the Grace of God, do not deliver any [of these] to anybody
until I arrive at your place. It is instructed until I have arrived at you[r place]. O God, O God, the instruction,
on account of these goods, is that you store them in a safe place. that it be placed in a good location,
and do not deliver to any one of them a thing without me. Do not deliver a thing to anybody without my [consent].
Peace be upon you. God's mercy and blessings. Peace upon you [plural form] and the mercy of God and His blessing.
